name: Outrunner 3
detailed_description:
Do you think you won last time, but it wasn't!

Meet the long-awaited (By me and my cat) triquel of best platformer sequel from 2077 - Outrunner 3!

You know the rules. You are completely alone and you can trust no one.
Run through dangerous levels, jump through enemies and leave obstacles behind you.

One life - one try.Pass the trial without any injuries to the very end or die miserably and start from the very beginning. Use your skills and reaction not to be caught by surprise by sneaky enemies. Use surroundings to save your life and try to escape the deadly labyrinth of abrupt traps.

Can you run away from your destiny again?

Features:

● Simple but challenging gameplay
● New levels to explore
● Lovely and OST from KAITAITHEMAID and I'vegotlevelup

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Even a potato can run this
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 1080 ti if you're cold
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

release_date.date: Q1 2019 or when i beat crippling depression
